name: Bucket of Bolts
description:
The asteroid field is collapsing and your ship is broken! 1-4 players must work together to navigate asteroids, blast aliens, and collect crystals before escaping to hyperspace.

Controls (Gamepad):

Move: left stick

Jump/Jetpack: A

Use Terminal: B

Controls (Keyboard):

Move: Arrow Keys

Jump/Jetpack: Z

Use Terminal: X

Created by Strider Toll for WCC's ANI 260

LinkedIn
